refnamediv.refpurpose: Calls dunif function defined on R which takes r(size of vector), V(a vector of size r), min value and max value of function as input parameters and the result is the probability density value of uniform distribution for each element in the given vector

listitem.para: V : a vector of size r
min : minimum value of the distribution
max : maximum value of the distribution

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The function calls the dunif() function in R that takes r, V, min and max value of function as the input arguments and returns the probability density value of uniform distribution for each element in the given vector.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting: // dunif on r, V, min and max y = dunif(5, [1,2,3,6,8], 3, 7)

simplelist.member: Mohana N (Assistant Professor, SAS, Division of Mathematics, VIT Chennai)
